display_long_description:
[media]

**Pixel Dungeon: Part 1 is a lightweight version of Pixel Dungeon, focusing on an in-depth experience of the first map**.

**Get Full Version:** 

**meta.com/experiences/6743334779111805**

- Discord: **discord.gg/pdvr** (pixel dungeon vr)
- Complete in-game tasks to win exclusive rewards🎁

An interactive RPG action adventure dungeon crawler with captivating pixel art style. Grab your weapons and venture into randomly generated dungeons for a thrilling adventure!

# 👐 Solo or Co-op
Solo or 3-player team-up. Co-op multiplayer enhances your social experience with smarter battle strategies, real-time teammate guidance, and integrated voice chat.
[media]

# 🕌 Endless Dungeons
Explore randomly generated dungeons in pixel world, offering a new challenge with each adventure. Discover elite rooms, intricate mazes, and easter egg chambers! 
[media]

# ⚔️ Immersive Combat Experience
Choose, mix and match from 10+ types of weapons—snipe with a crossbow, wield a heavy sword, throw axes, wield a magic wand... and face off against unique monsters and epic boss in a non-stop thrill ride! 
[media]

# 🧝‍♂️ Diverse Avatars
Start with 30, more avatars designs to be determined by players. Unleash your imagination & share your ideas in Discord!

# 🌟 Growth System
- **Talent**: Utilize the talent system to upgrade different abilities, enhance combat prowess, unlock new skills and items.
- **Weapon Crafting**: Forge your own legendary gear by upgrading weapons or rerolling their attributes.
